conbody.p: When using CoW-image backing storage, the entire nova-local volume group is allocated to the Instances Logical Volume (LV) mapped to /etc/nova/instances. VMs volumes are stored as sparse files in the Instances LV.

sl.sli: Local Storage Requirement = N * AvgImageSize + Overhead + Margin
N = Total number of VMs expected on compute node
AvgImageSize = average size of all sparse VM volumes on expected on compute node (qcow2 files)
Overhead =Overhead for bookkeeping, console, and libvirt (recommend 10â€’20 GB)
